function.name: generate_goal_resolution
function.description: write a compelling and vivid narration, in third-person and past tense, of how the characters attempt to achieve the given goal.

narration.description: The compelling and vivid narration, in third-person and past tense, of how the characters attempt to achieve the given goal. At the most four or five paragraphs.

success_determination.description: The decision whether the attempt to achieve the goal was successful.

resolution.description: A specific resolution of the attempt, detailing the outcome.
